activities:
We collect first and last name, email address and phone number when filling out our contact us form on the website. We use this information to respond to inquiries, to discuss products or simply attend to customer service requests.

For customers of our clients, we will collect information from under the direction of our clients which may include but is not limited to name, email address and phone number. We only use this information to fulfill our services to our clients (such as fulfilling order and administering accounts).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We do not manually process data.
